Key Match Events: Brazil scored a 2-1 away win over Chile in a FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifying match
Chile opened the scoring seconds after the kickoff with a goal by Eduardo Vargas
Luiz Henrique scored the winning goal for Brazil in the 89th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Luiz Henrique expressed his joy at scoring the winning goal for Brazil and emphasized the importance of the team's victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed for 30 minutes due to a wet pitch
Others: Brazil's win means they will finish the ninth round of the round-robin competition in fourth place in South American qualifying
Chile remains one of the worst-performing teams in South American qualifying
